tidbits.title: French Overseas Department
tidbits.description: Mayotte is an overseas department and region of France, known for its beautiful beaches and rich marine biodiversity.

tidbits.title: Cultural Diversity
tidbits.description: The island has a diverse population with influences from Comorian, French, and other cultures, reflected in its traditions and customs.

tidbits.title: Natural Wonders
tidbits.description: Mayotte offers natural wonders like coral reefs, lagoons, and volcanic landscapes, attracting visitors for diving and ecotourism.
